allow:
Bash(# Save current game state to binary file
tmux send-keys -t lldb2048 "memory read --outfile game_quicksave.bin --binary --count 200 g" Enter)

Bash(# Check if LLDB is still running with the game
tmux capture-pane -t lldb2048:0 -p | tail -20)

Bash(# Send DOWN to merge the 8s
tmux send-keys -t lldb2048:0 "s")

Bash(# Check result
sleep 1
tmux capture-pane -t lldb2048:0 -p | grep -B 2 -A 10 "Score:")

Bash(# Let the game initialize
sleep 1

# Check the game display
tmux capture-pane -t game2048_fresh -p)

Bash(# Use the newer PID
tmux send-keys -t game2048_fresh:lldb C-c  # Cancel if needed
tmux send-keys -t game2048_fresh:lldb "lldb -p 21821" Enter)

Bash(# Check final state
sleep 1
tmux capture-pane -t clean2048 -p)

Bash(# Save current state with our workflow
/Users/jasonwalsh/projects/jwalsh/2048/save_analyze_workflow.sh)

Bash(# Manually save the game state
tmux send-keys -t game2048:lldb "memory read --outfile score180_grid.bin --binary --count 64 g->grid_data_ptr" Enter
sleep 0.5
tmux send-keys -t game2048:lldb "process save-core score180_game.core" Enter)
